product_name: Ahnu Delta Water Shoes - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: From kayaking to boogie boarding to tidepool wading, the Ahnu Delta water shoes protect your feet without weighing you down. QuiteLight(R) construction principles throughout the shoes center on superior comfort and materials with exceptional strength-to-weight ratios. Highly flexible and well ventilated, the polyurethane mesh uppers hug your feet; neoprene-like heel wraps keep them securely in place. Slight toe and heel bumpers protect your feet from river rocks or other bumps and abrasions. Removable, perforated EVA footbeds add cushion underfoot and drain easily. Nonmarking rubber outsoles with flex grooves grip wet and dry surfaces, providing solid traction. Closeout.
short_description: From kayaking to boogie boarding to tidepool wading, the Ahnu Delta water shoes protect your feet without weighing you down.
